Sri Mulyani Ingatkan Dirjen Pajak untuk Genjot Penerimaan 2019
01 Nov 2019, 06:47 by Caesar Akbar, Rahma Tri
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani Indrawati meminta Direktur Jenderal Pajak Suryo Utomo berfokus mengejar target penerimaan pajak 2019 yang tinggal tersisa dua bulan lagi. Suryo Utomo baru saja dilantik menggantikan Dirjen Pajak sebelumnya Robert Pakpahan.
"Saya berharap meskipun 2019 tinggal dua bulan, pak Suryo tetap akan fokus di dalam mencapai target penerimaan negara di bidang pajak yang hari ini mengalami tekanan yang berat. Pertumbuhan penerimaan harus tetap dilakukan," ujar Sri Mulyani saat berpidato dalam pelantikan hari ini, Jumat, 1 November 2019.
Sri Mulyani optimistis, target itu bisa dikejar, baik dengan intensifikasi maupun ekstensifikasi yang dilakukan secara sesuai. Ia menyebut, belakangan penerimaan pajak korporasi dan Pajak Pertambahan Nilai mengalami perlambatan. Meski, ia belum mau menyebutkan proyeksi penerimaan hingga akhir tahun nanti.
Pada 17 September lalu, Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani Indrawati yakin target penerimaan pajak 2019 tercapai. Meskipun, kata dia, saat ini ekonomi Indonesia dalam tekanan yang cukup berat.

Sri Mulyani Reminds Director General of Taxes to Boost 2019 Receipts
01 Nov 2019, 06:47 by Caesar Akbar, Rahma Tri
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Finance Minister Sri Mulyani Indrawati has asked Director General of Tax Suryo Utomo to focus on pursuing the 2019 tax revenue target, with only two months left. Suryo Utomo has just been appointed to replace the previous Director General of Tax Robert Pakpahan.
"I hope that even though 2019 is only two months left, Pak Suryo will continue to focus on achieving the target of state revenue in the tax sector which is currently experiencing heavy pressure. Revenue growth must continue," Sri Mulyani said while addressing the inauguration today, Friday, November 1, 2019.
Sri Mulyani is optimistic that the target can be pursued, both with intensification and extensification which is carried out accordingly. He said, recently corporate tax receipts and Value Added Taxes had slowed. Although, he did not want to mention the projection of revenue until the end of the year.
On September 17, Minister of Finance Sri Mulyani Indrawati was sure the 2019 tax revenue target had been reached. Although, he said, the Indonesian economy is currently under considerable pressure.
